@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper function to proxy access to window.location.* functions. The main purpose of proxying them is to allow them to be spyable in unit tests.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} URI of the page the browser is currently showing
@return.description: URI of the page the browser is currently showing

@param.name: @param
@param.body: loc {String} - URI of the location the browser should be redirected to
@param.description: - URI of the location the browser should be redirected to

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Boolean} parameter to call reload with

@param.name: @param
@param.body: target {String} where to open the window
